mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_no, academy_code , review_writer, review_title, review_content, review_date) VALUES ( seq_review_review_no.nextval , #{academyCode} , #{reviewWriter.userNo} , #{reviewTitle} , #{reviewContent} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no , a.academy_code academy_code, u.user_no review_writer , u.email , r.review_title , r.review_content , r.review_date FROM academy a , review r , (SELECT u.user_no , u.email from users u)u WHERE r.review_writer = u.user_no AND a.academy_code = r.academy_code AND review_no = (#{value})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT r.review_no , r.review_title , r.review_content , u.email , r.review_date , r.review_state FROM review r, users u , academy a WHERE r.review_writer = u.user_no AND r.academy_code = a.academy_code AND r.academy_code = '${searchAcademyCode}' AND (r.review_state = '0' OR r.review_state = '1') ORDER BY review_date desc ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT r.review_title , r.review_content , u.email , r.review_date , a.academy_code FROM review r , users u , academy a WHERE r.review_writer = u.user_no AND a.academy_code = r.academy_code AND r.academy_code = '${academyCode}' AND (r.review_state = '0' OR r.review_state = '1') ) countTable
